languages.text: "Вот теперь заживем! Говорят, склады ломятся от питбрикетов — всем, даже теневым хватит!"
"Now things are looking up! I heard the warehouses are bursting with nutribars — everyone, even the folk from the Shadow Quarters, will have enough!"
languages.original_text: "Вот теперь заживем! Говорят, склады ломятся от питбрикетов — всем, даже теневым хватит!"

traits.locale_text: "Now things are looking up! I heard the warehouses are bursting with nutribars — everyone, even the folk from the Shadow Quarters, will have enough!"
"Now things are looking up! I heard the warehouses are bursting with nutribars — everyone, even the folk from the Shadow Quarters, will have enough!"
"Now things are looking up! I heard the warehouses are bursting with nutribars — everyone, even the folk from the Shadow Quarters, will have enough!"

languages.text: 「事態がようやく好転してきました！倉庫には栄養バーが溢れかえっていると聞きました。皆、シャドウクォーターからの人々も含めて、十分な食料が手に入るでしょう！」
languages.original_text: "Now things are looking up! I heard the warehouses are bursting with nutribars — everyone, even the folk from the Shadow Quarters, will have enough!"

traits.locale_text: 「事態がようやく好転してきました！倉庫には栄養バーが溢れかえっていると聞きました。皆、シャドウクォーターからの人々も含めて、十分な食料が手に入るでしょう！」
「事態がようやく好転してきました！倉庫には栄養バーが溢れかえっていると聞きました。皆、シャドウクォーターからの人々も含めて、十分な食料が手に入るでしょう！」

languages.text: « La situation s'améliore ! Il paraît que les entrepôts regorgent de nutribarres, et qu'il y en a assez pour tout le monde, même les habitants du Quartier des Ombres ! »
languages.original_text: "Now things are looking up! I heard the warehouses are bursting with nutribars — everyone, even the folk from the Shadow Quarters, will have enough!"

traits.locale_text: « La situation s'améliore ! Il paraît que les entrepôts regorgent de nutribarres, et qu'il y en a assez pour tout le monde, même les habitants du Quartier des Ombres ! »

languages.text: “现在的情况真是越来越好了！我听说仓库里的营养条都堆积成山了！每个人，就连阴影区的那些人，都能得到足够的营养条！”
languages.original_text: "Now things are looking up! I heard the warehouses are bursting with nutribars — everyone, even the folk from the Shadow Quarters, will have enough!"

traits.locale_text: “现在的情况真是越来越好了！我听说仓库里的营养条都堆积成山了！每个人，就连阴影区的那些人，都能得到足够的营养条！”

languages.text: «¡Ahora tiene mejor pinta la cosa! Me han contado que los almacenes están hasta arriba de barritas de nutrientes. Todo el mundo tendrá algo que llevarse a la boca, ¡hasta los de los barrios bajos!»
languages.original_text: "Now things are looking up! I heard the warehouses are bursting with nutribars — everyone, even the folk from the Shadow Quarters, will have enough!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Ahora tiene mejor pinta la cosa! Me han contado que los almacenes están hasta arriba de barritas de nutrientes. Todo el mundo tendrá algo que llevarse a la boca, ¡hasta los de los barrios bajos!»

languages.text: "Jetzt geht es wieder aufwärts! Angeblich quillen die Lager über vor Nutririegeln. Alle bekommen genug, sogar die Leute aus den Schattenquartieren!"
languages.original_text: "Now things are looking up! I heard the warehouses are bursting with nutribars — everyone, even the folk from the Shadow Quarters, will have enough!"

traits.locale_text: "Jetzt geht es wieder aufwärts! Angeblich quillen die Lager über vor Nutririegeln. Alle bekommen genug, sogar die Leute aus den Schattenquartieren!"

languages.text: "Şimdi işler yoluna girdi işte! Depolar besinbarlarla doluymuş, öyle diyorlar. Herkese, Gölge Mahalli sakinlerine bile yetecek kadar varmış!"
languages.original_text: "Now things are looking up! I heard the warehouses are bursting with nutribars — everyone, even the folk from the Shadow Quarters, will have enough!"

traits.locale_text: "Şimdi işler yoluna girdi işte! Depolar besinbarlarla doluymuş, öyle diyorlar. Herkese, Gölge Mahali’ndekilere bile yetecek kadar varmış!"
